reg_pit.title: Wildlife Management Area Use and Access Regulation

change.changenote: Schedule 1, sections 6 to 16 were enacted by BC Reg 111/2019, effective May 29, 2019.
Schedule 2, sections 6 to 16 were enacted by BC Reg 111/2019, effective May 29, 2019.
Schedule 4, sections 7 to 17 were enacted by BC Reg 111/2019, effective May 29, 2019.
Schedule, Maps exemption note BEFORE amended by BC Reg 68/2015, effective May 6, 2015.

bcl:lefttext.in:em: Maps are exempt from publication and may be inspected at the offices of the Ministry of Forests, Lands and Natural Resource Operations, 2975 Jutland Road, Victoria, B.C. V8T 5J9, during regular office hours.
